localize.text: You have proved that you are more capable than you originally thought.
The high echelon is watching you.
A farmer who sows seeds on a virgin soil.
He might want to see you in person soon.
If that happens, you can make your dreams come true.
Me? Of course, I admire him.
To be fair, he is the one who created me.
There are few who would understand him.
In fact, understanding anyone is difficult.
Will a day come when I understand you completely?
